description: Chest pain or discomfort due to reduced blood flow to heart muscle
dosage: Nitroglycerin 0.4mg sublingual as needed, Aspirin 81mg daily, Metoprolol 25-50mg twice daily
precautions: Carry nitroglycerin always, sit down when taking it, may cause headache and dizziness
when_to_seek_emergency: If chest pain lasts more than 5 minutes or worsens, call emergency services immediately

description: Intense chest pain that may radiate to arm jaw or back indicating possible myocardial infarction
dosage: Aspirin 325mg chewable immediately while waiting for ambulance
precautions: Call emergency services first, chew aspirin do not swallow whole, stay calm and sit down
when_to_seek_emergency: This is a medical emergency - call 911 immediately, do not drive yourself

description: Feeling of rapid fluttering or pounding heartbeat irregular heart rhythm
dosage: Metoprolol 25-100mg twice daily, Diltiazem 120-360mg daily extended release
precautions: Avoid caffeine and alcohol, monitor heart rate, may cause fatigue
when_to_seek_emergency: If accompanied by chest pain, fainting, or severe shortness of breath, seek immediate care

description: Heart rhythm disorder causing irregular and often rapid heart rate
dosage: Apixaban 5mg twice daily, Metoprolol 50-100mg twice daily
precautions: Blood thinner requires monitoring for bleeding, avoid alcohol excess
when_to_seek_emergency: Seek emergency care if experiencing stroke symptoms or uncontrolled bleeding

description: Consistently elevated blood pressure putting strain on heart and blood vessels
dosage: Lisinopril 10-40mg daily, Amlodipine 5-10mg daily
precautions: Monitor blood pressure regularly, reduce salt intake, may cause dizziness
when_to_seek_emergency: If BP exceeds 180/120 with symptoms like headache or vision changes, seek emergency care

description: Difficulty breathing due to heart's inability to pump blood effectively
dosage: Furosemide 20-80mg daily, Lisinopril 5-40mg daily, Carvedilol 3.125-25mg twice daily
precautions: Monitor weight daily, restrict fluid and sodium, take diuretics in morning
when_to_seek_emergency: If sudden severe shortness of breath or coughing pink frothy sputum, call 911

description: Heart rate over 100 beats per minute at rest
dosage: Metoprolol 25-100mg twice daily, Diltiazem 120-240mg daily
precautions: Check pulse regularly, avoid stimulants, may cause fatigue or dizziness
when_to_seek_emergency: If heart rate exceeds 150 or accompanied by chest pain or fainting, seek emergency care

description: Heart rate under 60 beats per minute causing symptoms
recommended_medicine: Atropine for emergency, may require pacemaker
dosage: Atropine 0.5mg IV in emergency setting, pacemaker for chronic cases
precautions: Usually requires medical device, stop medications causing slow heart rate
when_to_seek_emergency: If experiencing fainting, severe fatigue, or confusion, seek immediate medical attention

description: Edema in lower extremities often related to heart failure or poor circulation
dosage: Furosemide 20-40mg daily in morning, Spironolactone 25-50mg daily
precautions: Elevate legs, reduce salt intake, monitor weight, may increase urination
when_to_seek_emergency: If sudden severe swelling with shortness of breath, seek emergency care

description: Narrowing of coronary arteries reducing blood flow to heart
dosage: Aspirin 81mg daily, Atorvastatin 20-80mg at bedtime, Metoprolol 50-100mg twice daily
precautions: Take statin at night, carry nitroglycerin, avoid heavy meals before activity
when_to_seek_emergency: Chest pain lasting over 5 minutes or not relieved by rest requires emergency care

description: Lightheadedness due to inadequate blood pressure or heart rhythm issues
recommended_medicine: Midodrine, Fludrocortisone, increase fluid and salt intake
dosage: Midodrine 2.5-10mg three times daily, Fludrocortisone 0.1-0.2mg daily
precautions: Rise slowly from sitting or lying, stay hydrated, wear compression stockings
when_to_seek_emergency: If fainting, severe dizziness with chest pain, or confusion, seek immediate help

description: Extreme tiredness due to heart not pumping efficiently
recommended_medicine: Carvedilol, Lisinopril, Iron supplements if anemic
dosage: Carvedilol 3.125-25mg twice daily, Lisinopril 5-20mg daily
precautions: Pace activities, rest when needed, monitor for worsening symptoms
when_to_seek_emergency: Sudden severe fatigue with other cardiac symptoms requires medical evaluation

description: Pain in legs during walking due to narrowed arteries
dosage: Cilostazol 100mg twice daily, Aspirin 81-325mg daily, Atorvastatin 40-80mg daily
precautions: Take 30 minutes before or 2 hours after meals, stop smoking, exercise regularly
when_to_seek_emergency: If leg pain at rest or non-healing wounds, consult vascular specialist urgently

description: Sudden episodes of very rapid heartbeat originating above ventricles
recommended_medicine: Adenosine for acute, Metoprolol or Diltiazem for prevention
dosage: Adenosine 6mg rapid IV push in emergency, Metoprolol 50-100mg twice daily for prevention
precautions: Learn vagal maneuvers, avoid caffeine and alcohol, carry emergency medication
when_to_seek_emergency: If episode lasts over 30 minutes or causes chest pain or fainting, call 911

description: Regular but rapid heart rhythm typically around 150 beats per minute
dosage: Diltiazem 120-360mg daily, Metoprolol 50-200mg daily, Apixaban 5mg twice daily
precautions: Rate control important, anticoagulation prevents stroke, monitor for bleeding
when_to_seek_emergency: Sudden onset with hemodynamic instability requires emergency cardioversion

description: Extra abnormal heartbeats originating in ventricles causing skipped beat sensation
dosage: Metoprolol 25-50mg twice daily if symptomatic, often no treatment needed
precautions: Reduce caffeine and stress, usually harmless, monitor frequency
when_to_seek_emergency: Frequent PVCs with other symptoms or very frequent burden needs cardiology evaluation

description: Sudden shortness of breath waking from sleep due to heart failure
recommended_medicine: Furosemide, Lisinopril, elevate head of bed
dosage: Furosemide 40-80mg in morning, Lisinopril 10-40mg daily
precautions: Sleep with head elevated, avoid fluids before bed, monitor weight daily
when_to_seek_emergency: Acute episode with pink frothy sputum is pulmonary edema emergency

description: Dizziness upon standing due to blood pressure drop
dosage: Midodrine 5-10mg three times daily, Fludrocortisone 0.1mg daily
precautions: Rise slowly, stay hydrated, avoid hot environments, increase salt intake
when_to_seek_emergency: If fainting or falling, immediate medical evaluation needed

description: Inability to perform physical activity due to heart limitation
dosage: Carvedilol 6.25-25mg twice daily, Lisinopril 10-40mg daily
precautions: Gradual exercise increase, supervised cardiac rehab, monitor symptoms
when_to_seek_emergency: Worsening exercise tolerance or new symptoms during activity needs urgent evaluation

description: Leg swelling worse at end of day related to heart or vein problems
dosage: Furosemide 20-40mg morning dose, compression stockings 20-30mmHg
precautions: Elevate legs above heart level, avoid prolonged standing, reduce sodium
when_to_seek_emergency: If one leg more swollen than other with pain, could be blood clot - seek emergency care

description: High blood pressure during sleep causing morning headaches
dosage: Amlodipine 5-10mg at bedtime, Lisinopril 10-20mg bedtime dosing
precautions: Monitor blood pressure in morning, sleep apnea screening, weight loss if obese
when_to_seek_emergency: Severe headache with vision changes or neurological symptoms requires emergency evaluation

description: Cold hands and feet due to reduced peripheral blood flow
dosage: Amlodipine 5-10mg daily, Cilostazol 50-100mg twice daily
precautions: Keep extremities warm, avoid smoking, regular exercise
when_to_seek_emergency: If associated with pain, color changes, or wounds, vascular evaluation needed

description: Loss of consciousness due to temporary reduced brain blood flow
recommended_medicine: Depends on cause - Midodrine, Fludrocortisone, or pacemaker
dosage: Midodrine 5-10mg TID if vasovagal, pacemaker if cardiac cause
precautions: Stay hydrated, avoid triggers, medical alert bracelet
when_to_seek_emergency: Any unexplained fainting requires immediate medical evaluation to rule out cardiac cause

description: Shortness of breath with physical activity indicating cardiac limitation
recommended_medicine: Metoprolol, Lisinopril, Furosemide if fluid overload
dosage: Metoprolol 50-100mg twice daily, Lisinopril 10-40mg daily
precautions: Gradual activity increase, cardiac rehab, avoid overexertion
when_to_seek_emergency: Progressive worsening or dyspnea at rest requires urgent cardiology consultation

description: Forceful or pounding sensation of heartbeat
dosage: Metoprolol 25-50mg twice daily, Propranolol 10-40mg twice daily
precautions: Reduce caffeine alcohol stress, relaxation techniques, adequate sleep
when_to_seek_emergency: If associated with chest pain, syncope, or family history of sudden death, urgent evaluation needed

description: Persistent cough especially when lying down due to fluid congestion
recommended_medicine: Furosemide, Lisinopril, elevate head during sleep
dosage: Furosemide 40-80mg daily, Lisinopril 20-40mg daily
precautions: Sleep with elevated head, monitor for pink sputum, daily weights
when_to_seek_emergency: Cough with pink frothy sputum or severe breathlessness is pulmonary edema - call 911

description: Nausea or indigestion during physical activity may indicate angina
dosage: Nitroglycerin 0.4mg sublingual PRN, Aspirin 81mg daily, Metoprolol 50mg twice daily
precautions: Women may have atypical symptoms, carry nitroglycerin, stop activity if occurs
when_to_seek_emergency: Persistent nausea with chest discomfort or sweating requires emergency evaluation

description: Jaw or teeth pain during activity may indicate heart problem
dosage: Nitroglycerin 0.4mg sublingual for symptoms, Aspirin 81mg daily
precautions: Atypical cardiac symptom especially in women, needs stress test evaluation
when_to_seek_emergency: Jaw pain with chest discomfort, sweating, or shortness of breath - call 911 immediately

description: Left arm discomfort or pain may indicate cardiac ischemia
dosage: Aspirin 325mg chewable if acute, Nitroglycerin 0.4mg sublingual, call 911
precautions: Classic heart attack symptom, do not ignore, immediate action required
when_to_seek_emergency: Left arm pain with chest symptoms is potential heart attack - emergency services immediately

description: Persistent indigestion or heartburn may mask cardiac issues
recommended_medicine: Rule out cardiac cause first, then Nitroglycerin trial vs antacids
dosage: If cardiac: Aspirin 81mg daily, Nitroglycerin PRN; if GI: antacids as needed
precautions: Cardiac symptoms can mimic indigestion especially in women and diabetics
when_to_seek_emergency: Indigestion with exertion, sweating, or radiation requires cardiac evaluation not just antacids

description: Overall weakness and fatigue due to poor cardiac function
recommended_medicine: Carvedilol, Lisinopril, cardiac rehabilitation, iron if deficient
dosage: Carvedilol 3.125-25mg twice daily, Lisinopril 10-40mg daily
precautions: Gradual exercise program, nutritional support, monitor hemoglobin
when_to_seek_emergency: Sudden severe weakness with other cardiac symptoms requires immediate medical attention

description: Sudden severe back or chest pain may indicate aortic emergency
recommended_medicine: IMMEDIATE EMERGENCY - hospitalization, blood pressure control
dosage: Emergency IV beta-blockers and vasodilators, surgical consultation urgent
precautions: Life-threatening emergency, tearing or ripping pain, very high mortality
when_to_seek_emergency: Sudden severe chest or back pain with radiation - call 911 immediately, do not delay

description: May indicate electrolyte imbalance affecting heart rhythm
dosage: Fludrocortisone 0.1-0.2mg daily, salt tabs 1-2g with meals
precautions: Check aldosterone levels, monitor blood pressure, can worsen heart failure
when_to_seek_emergency: Unexplained salt craving with cardiac symptoms needs endocrine and cardiac workup

description: Frequent nighttime urination due to fluid redistribution from heart failure
recommended_medicine: Furosemide in morning not evening, fluid restriction after 6pm
dosage: Furosemide 40-80mg in morning, avoid evening dosing to prevent nocturia
precautions: Time diuretics appropriately, limit evening fluids, monitor for dehydration
when_to_seek_emergency: If associated with shortness of breath or swelling, heart failure exacerbation needs evaluation

description: Sudden weight gain indicating fluid accumulation from heart failure
recommended_medicine: Increase Furosemide dose, restrict sodium and fluids
dosage: Furosemide 40-120mg daily adjusted to response, sodium under 2g daily
precautions: Daily morning weights, call doctor if gain over 2-3 pounds in 1-2 days
when_to_seek_emergency: Weight gain over 5 pounds in one week with breathing difficulty requires urgent medical care

description: Abdominal fluid accumulation from severe heart failure or liver congestion
dosage: Furosemide 80-160mg daily, Spironolactone 50-100mg daily
precautions: Measure abdominal girth, severe sodium restriction, may need paracentesis
when_to_seek_emergency: Tense ascites with breathing difficulty or hepatic encephalopathy requires hospitalization

description: Blue discoloration indicating poor oxygenation from cardiac or pulmonary cause
recommended_medicine: Oxygen therapy, treat underlying heart failure or congenital heart disease
dosage: Oxygen 2-4L/min to maintain saturation over 90%, treat heart failure aggressively
precautions: Check oxygen saturation, may indicate severe cardiac decompensation
when_to_seek_emergency: Central cyanosis with respiratory distress is medical emergency requiring immediate care

description: Fingertip enlargement from chronic low oxygen often from heart disease
recommended_medicine: Treat underlying cardiac disease, oxygen if needed
dosage: Management depends on cause - heart failure treatment or surgical repair
precautions: Sign of chronic cardiac or pulmonary disease, needs complete cardiac workup
when_to_seek_emergency: New clubbing with worsening symptoms requires comprehensive cardiac evaluation

description: Visible neck vein distension indicating elevated right heart pressures
recommended_medicine: Furosemide, treat right heart failure or tricuspid regurgitation
dosage: Furosemide 40-80mg daily, may need increased doses for right heart failure
precautions: Sign of volume overload or right heart dysfunction, needs echocardiogram
when_to_seek_emergency: Distended neck veins with hypotension may indicate cardiac tamponade - emergency

description: Confusion in elderly may indicate reduced cardiac output or medication effect
recommended_medicine: Review medications, optimize heart failure treatment, check electrolytes
dosage: Adjust diuretic doses, check digoxin level if applicable, correct electrolytes
precautions: Can indicate poor cardiac output, medication toxicity, or electrolyte disturbance
when_to_seek_emergency: Acute confusion with cardiac symptoms requires emergency evaluation for stroke or heart attack

description: Anxiety and restlessness may indicate poor oxygenation or heart failure
recommended_medicine: Treat underlying heart condition, anxiolytics if appropriate after cardiac stable
dosage: Optimize heart failure medications first, consider low-dose benzodiazepine if needed
precautions: Rule out cardiac cause before treating as primary anxiety disorder
when_to_seek_emergency: Severe restlessness with chest pain or breathing difficulty requires emergency assessment

description: Loss of appetite due to advanced heart failure or medication effects
recommended_medicine: Optimize heart failure medications, nutritional support, small frequent meals
dosage: Continue cardiac medications, add nutritional supplements, anti-nausea if needed
precautions: May indicate advanced heart failure, medication side effect, or depression
when_to_seek_emergency: Significant weight loss with worsening cardiac symptoms needs urgent medical evaluation

description: Persistent hiccups may indicate cardiac irritation or phrenic nerve involvement
recommended_medicine: Treat underlying cause, metoclopramide or baclofen if persistent
dosage: Metoclopramide 10mg before meals, baclofen 5-10mg three times daily
precautions: Can indicate MI, pericarditis, or esophageal issues with cardiac involvement
when_to_seek_emergency: Hiccups with chest pain or after cardiac procedure requires immediate medical attention
